original_text: When the disciples heard this, they were even more surprised. They said, ‘So perhaps God will not save anyone!’
korean_text: 제자들이 듣고 몹시 놀라 이르되 그렇다면 누가 구원을 얻을 수 있으리이까

sentences.original_text: 'So perhaps God will not save anyone!'
sentences.korean_translation: '그래서 어쩌면 하나님은 아무도 구원하지 않으실 것이다!'
